review.reviewBody: Create Your Own 10" was delicious😋Instructions followed ✔️Packed well✔️Whether dining in restaurant or ordering delivery. I recommend this establishment👍
Very nice taste . The dough balls were excellent. The Cheesy Flatbread And Dip  was a little to garlicky  for me but I am sure many will appreciate that fact Overall well worth it.
Create Your Own 10" was delicious😋Love the idea of building your own pizza. Recommend it👍
Neither the Kids Mac & Cheese  nor the Chicken Noodle Soup had much flavour at all. The soup Chicken Noodle Soup also had an excessive amount of herbs in it that took away from the broth.
The soup was tasty, but received small size of chicken noodle soup instead of the large -12 ounce I ordered.
